title: What is the best way to meet Ed Sheeran? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can meet just about any touring musician, for a price - a steep price. Promoters know that there are people that will pay through the nose to meet their idols, and they don't miss an opportunity to make every buck they can. You can purchase a VIP package to most major concerts that will include premium tickets and a meet and greet backstage with the artist. Start saving.

Go to his concert and spend money by taking first row.. Jump as high as u can and shout his name and sing his song.. If you are lucky then definitely he will notice like Jordan (ranbir kapoor)  saw nargis fakri sister and brought her on stage to talk to her.. All the best!!!!
